bill_title: provide certain provisions requiring the official state seed certification agency to obtain liability insurance.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide certain provisions requiring the official state seed certification agency to obtain liability insurance. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 38-11 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: Any agency designated to perform various seed classification activities under § 38-11-6 shall obtain and pay for all forms of liability insurance to protect and assist the agency in meeting any obligation arising from any act or omission for which the agency may be legally liable. The liability insurance coverage obtained pursuant to this section shall protect the agency and the agency's agents or employees in the performance of official duties and against any act committed by them that reasonably could be considered to be within the scope of their official duty. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.161 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
